name: Docker Compose - Redis
description: Minimal docker-compose for Redis and redis-commander.

files.template:
version: '3.9'
services:
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    ports: ['6379:6379']
  redis-commander:
    image: rediscommander/redis-commander:latest
    environment:
      - REDIS_HOSTS=local:redis:6379
    ports: ['8081:8081']
    depends_on: [redis]
